attributes.action: Stop people/companies from profiting from  convicted sex offenders
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to stop anyone person or company from profiting from convicted sex offenders in the UK

It seems companies like iTunes (other music download sites are available) are still profiting from convicted sex offenders such as Gary Glitter and former lost prophets member Ian Watkins.

I would also like this law to stop anyone who enters the UK  with the intention to make money
who has been convicted of a sex offence in another country to be unable to work within the UK

for example

If a  singer is convicted in the USA of a sex offence and wanted to tour around the world they would not be granted  entrance to the UK  to preform


I ask the government to stop companies from  profiting from convicted Sex Offenders.
